column4: hi can some one please help me I have made a big mistake and did the following sudo usermod -Gsubversion user and now cant sudo anything, is there any way to fix this :(
so have I screwed my system guys or is there a fix ?

ull need to reboot into single user mode, then run usermod -G user again but this time as the option to G list all of the groups u wnat ur user in, and make sure to include admin and ur usernamelist all
